courses.title: Beginner Guitar Mastery
courses.description: Learn acoustic and electric guitar basics including chords, strumming patterns, and simple songs.

courses.title: Piano for Absolute Beginners
courses.description: Step-by-step piano course covering notes, scales, hand coordination, and basic melodies.

courses.title: Advanced Vocal Training
courses.description: Improve vocal range, control, breathing techniques, and performance confidence.

courses.title: Music Production with FL Studio
courses.description: Learn beat making, mixing, mastering, and sound design using FL Studio.

courses.title: Indian Classical Music Basics
courses.description: Understand ragas, taals, swaras, and the foundation of Indian classical music.

courses.title: DJ Mixing & Live Performance
courses.description: Master DJ equipment, beat matching, transitions, and live crowd performance skills.

courses.title: Ukulele for Beginners
courses.description: Learn basic ukulele chords, strumming styles, and popular beginner-friendly songs.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Create EDM tracks by learning synths, drops, layering, and arrangement techniques.

courses.title: Songwriting Essentials
courses.description: Learn lyrics writing, song structure, melody creation, and emotional storytelling.

courses.title: Tabla Fundamentals
courses.description: Master basic bols, hand techniques, rhythm patterns, and taals in tabla.

courses.title: Violin for Beginners
courses.description: Learn violin posture, bowing techniques, finger placement, and simple compositions.

courses.title: Music Theory Made Easy
courses.description: Understand scales, chords, intervals, harmony, and rhythm in a simple way.
